title: Introduction to geobr (R)
text: ’ve downloaded data, really simple plot maps using ggplot2.  Plot municipalities particular state, Rio de Janeiro:
code: # Remove plot axis no_axis <- theme(axis.title=element_blank(),                  axis.text=element_blank(),                  axis.ticks=element_blank())  # Plot all Brazilian states ggplot() +   geom_sf(data=states, fill="#2D3E50", color="#FEBF57", size=.15, show.legend = FALSE) +   labs(subtitle="States", size=8) +   theme_minimal() +   no_axis # Download all municipalities of Rio all_muni <- read_municipality(   code_muni = "RJ",    year= 2010,   showProgress = FALSE   )  # plot ggplot() +   geom_sf(data=all_muni, fill="#2D3E50", color="#FEBF57", size=.15, show.legend = FALSE) +   labs(subtitle="Municipalities of Rio de Janeiro, 2000", size=8) +   theme_minimal() +   no_axis

title: Introduction to geobr (R)
text: First, need data.frame estimates Life Expectancy merge spatial database. two-digit abbreviation state name key column join two databases.
code: # Read data.frame with life expectancy data df <- utils::read.csv(system.file("extdata/br_states_lifexpect2017.csv", package = "geobr"), encoding = "UTF-8")  states$name_state <- tolower(states$name_state) df$uf <- tolower(df$uf)  # join the databases states <- dplyr::left_join(states, df, by = c("name_state" = "uf"))

title: Introduction to geobr (R)
text: Following steps , can use together geobr sister package censobr map proportion households connected sewage network Brazilian municipalities First, need download households data Brazilian census using read_households() function. Now ’re going () group observations municipality, (b) get number households connected sewage network, (c) calculate proportion households connected, (d) collect results. Now need download geometries Brazilian municipalities geobr, merge spatial data estimates map results.
code: library(censobr) library(arrow) #>  #> Attaching package: 'arrow' #> The following object is masked from 'package:utils': #>  #>     timestamp  hs <- read_households(year = 2010,                        showProgress = FALSE) #> ℹ Downloading data and storing it locally for future use. esg <- hs |>          collect() |>         group_by(code_muni) |>                                             # (a)         summarize(rede = sum(V0010[which(V0207=='1')]),                    # (b)                   total = sum(V0010)) |>                                   # (b)         mutate(cobertura = rede / total) |>                                # (c)         collect()                                                          # (d)  head(esg) #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   code_muni     rede  total cobertura #>       <int>    <dbl>  <dbl>     <dbl> #> 1   1100015     0     7443.   0       #> 2   1100023   182.   27654.   0.00660 #> 3   1100031     0     1979.   0       #> 4   1100049 10019.   24413.   0.410   #> 5   1100056     5.81  5399    0.00108 #> 6   1100064    28.9   6013.   0.00480 # download municipality geometries muni_sf <- geobr::read_municipality(year = 2010,                                     showProgress = FALSE) #> Using year/date 2010  # merge data esg_sf <- left_join(muni_sf, esg, by = 'code_muni')  # plot map ggplot() +   geom_sf(data = esg_sf, aes(fill = cobertura), color=NA) +   labs(title = "Share of households connected to a sewage network") +   scale_fill_distiller(palette = "Greens", direction = 1,                         name='Share of\nhouseholds',                         labels = scales::percent) +   theme_void()

title: Download spatial data of Brazil's Legal Amazon — read_amazon
text: year Numeric. Year data YYYY format. defaults NULL reads data latest year available. simplified Logic FALSE TRUE, indicating whether function return data set 'original' spatial resolution data set 'simplified' geometry. Defaults TRUE. spatial analysis statistics users set simplified = FALSE. Borders simplified removing vertices borders using st_simplify{sf} preserving topology dTolerance 100. showProgress Logical. Defaults TRUE display progress bar. cache Logical. Whether function read data cached locally, faster. Defaults cache = TRUE. default, geobr stores data files temporary directory exists within R session. cache = FALSE, function download data overwrite local file.

title: geobr v1.9.1999999999 dev
text: Major changes Now functions download data latest year available default. Closes #378. Minor changes Fix url redundancy avoid internet connection problems. New data neighborhoods 2022 updated census tracts 2022

title: geobr v1.9.1
text: CRAN release: 2024-09-06 Minor changes read_municipality() new parameter keep_areas_operacionais, allows users control wether data keep polygons Lagoas dos Patos Lagoa Mirim State Rio Grande Sul (considered areas estaduais operacionais). default FALSE drops two polygons. Closes #176. Functions now include cache parameter allows users decide whehter keep files cache force downloading . moment, files cached R session, step towards future version {geobr} files based permanent caching. Now using curl::multi_download() download files parallel Removed dependency {httr} package {geobr} now imports {fs} use robust cross-platform file system operations Simplified streamlined internal functions

title: geobr v1.9.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-04-18 Major changes Function read_health_facilities() now new parameter date, allow users access data different dates reference. plan least one update data set per year. Closes #334. Functions read_urban_area() read_metro_area() now new parameter code_state, allow users filter selected states. Closes #338 Bug fix Using data.table::rbindlist() rind data throwing errors observations class POLYGONS others MULTIPOLYGONS. now replaced dplyr::bind_rows() small performance penalty. Closes #346. New data schools 2023 health facilities 202303 census tracts 2020 2022

title: geobr v1.8.2
text: CRAN release: 2024-01-09 CRAN request Fixed issue make sure geobr uses suggested packages conditionally Minor changes Fixed non-ASCII characters data geobr::grid_state_correspondence_table()

title: geobr v1.8.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-09-21 CRAN request geobr now uses suggested packages conditionally

title: geobr v1.8.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-09-09 New function read_capitals() download either spatial sf object location municipal seats (sede dos municipios) state capitals, data.frame names codes state capitals. Closes #243 Minor changes Update intro vignette show use geobr together new censobr sister package. Bug fixes fixed bug conflict sf data.table messing plot extent. Closes #284. fixed bug conflicts plotly data.table. Closes #279. fixed bug cep_to_state() function. Closes #317. fixed bug progress bar. Closes #154. lookup_muni() download_metadata() functions now robust internet connection failures.

title: geobr v1.7.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-08-16 Major changes data sets now simultaneously stored github Ipea’s server. package first tries download data Ipea’s server. case Ipea’s link line reason, package tries download data github. users, effect change package much stable less vulnerable instabilities data server connection. Minor changes Started using package documentation templates Roxygen Reduced lot code redundancy Important update tothe check_connection() function

title: geobr v1.6.0
text: New data sets/functions v1.6 onwards, geobr stores downloaded temporary cache tempdir(). Closes #225. New function read_comparable_areas read historically comparable municipalities, aka Areas minimas comparaveis (AMCs). Closes issue #17 New data set macro regions og health, can accessed using new macro parameter added read_health_region() function. Closes issue #219. New internal support function is_online()check internet connection Ipea server. Closes #229 New data/function read_urban_concentrations. Closes #232 New data/function read_pop_arrangements. Closes #231 Country Regions States Micro regions Meso regions Immediate regions Intermediate regions Municipalities Census tracts Updated data indigenous land March 2021 Minor changes Improved package test coverage 99.16%. Improved documentation considering Roxygen: list(markdown = TRUE) fix column names grid_state_correspondence_table Improve warning message regarding connection geobr server Ipea Fix read_municipality reading state abbreviation 1991.

title: geobr v1.5-1
text: CRAN release: 2021-02-06 Minor changes Fixed unnecessary warning internet connection. Closes #200.

title: geobr v1.5
text: CRAN release: 2021-02-03 New data sets/functions new function read_schools read schools data - closes issue #190 (added 2020-10). data census_tracts 2017 agricultural census - closes issue #171 (added 2020-11). new function cep_to_state determine state given CEP postal code (added 2021-01). Minor changes geobr now automatically detects internet connection problem throws error. Closes issue #178 imports data.table use rbindlist improve package speed downloading data whole country. Closes issue #199. new intro vignette Python users

title: geobr v1.4
text: CRAN release: 2020-10-04 New data sets/functions data set read_health_region read health regions - closes issue #149 (added 2020-07). updated 2019 data sets intermediate, immediate micro meso regions, states municipalities. Minor changes improved documentation argument simplified included documentation argument zone read_census_tract function read_municipality() function now also takes additional inputs data sets 1992. Closes issue #163 (added 2020-06) harmonized st_geometry_type() data sets MULTIPOLYGON, appropriate. Closes issues #41 #151 #135 #172 fix typo geobr::grid_state_correspondence_table. Closes #187 argument tp fully deprecated replaced simplified. warning message sample data life expectancy Brazilian states 2017. used vignette

title: geobr v1.3 (2020-03-30)
text: CRAN release: 2020-03-29 New data sets/functions data set read_neighborhood read neighborhood limits Brazilian municipalities - closes issue #104 (added 2020-03). Major changes New argument showProgress display progress bar. Defaults TRUE Argument tp deprecated replaced argument simplified needs either TRUE FALSE. affect user previously used tp=TRUE, now write simplified=FALSE Minor changes reorganization internal support functions reduce code redundancy substantial improvment test coverage functions substantial improvment test coverage functions modified package tests using new format crs objects. Following sf package update v0.9-0

title: geobr v1.2 (2020-02-20)
text: CRAN release: 2020-02-20 New data sets/functions data set read_metro_area read official metropolitan areas - closes issue #2 (added 2019-12). data set read_municipal_seat read spatial coordinates municipal seats- closes issue #86 (added 2019-12). function lookup_muni look municipality codes name, way around. closes issue #58 (added 2019-12) function list_geobr list datasets available geobr - Closes issue #57. Major changes MAJOR change geobr read geopackage files, instead .rds. structural change make easier maintain versions geobr R Python (2020-02) functions now additional argument tp data ‘type’. argument defaults read data sets ‘simplified’ borders, makes package much efficient downloading plotting data. Closes issue #76 (2020-02) Pretty much functions now download data entire country default. Closes issue #77. exceptions read_statistical_grid read_census_tract. two functions take really long time load data whole country might crash R due memory limits, user must ‘aware’ choice (2020-02) Minor changes New utils.R script containing support functions reduce code redundancy (2020-02)

title: geobr v1.1
text: CRAN release: 2019-12-03 New data sets/functions data set read_indigenous_land read official data indigenous lands ethnicities according stage demarcation - closes issue #47 (2019-09-04). data set read_disaster_risk_area read official data areas exposed risks geodynamic hydro-meteorological disasters capable triggering landslides floods - closes issue #14 (added 2019-09-24). data set read_biomes read official data polygons biomes present Brazilian territory - closes issue #45 (added 2019-09-24). data set read_amazon read official data Brazil’s Legal Amazon - closes issue #38 (added 2019-10-07). data set read_conservation_units read official data Environmental Conservation Units - closes issue #59 (added 2019-10-08). data set read_urban_area read official data urban footprint Brazilian cities - closes issue #52 (added 2019-10-17). data set biomes (2019) available scale 1:250.000. (added 2019-10-31) - closes issue #72 data set read_intermediate_region (2017) (added 2019-11-28) data set read_immediate_region (2017) (added 2019-11-28) function download_metadata simply download df data set addresses. Minor changes Changes read_region function improve speed remove dplyrdependency (added 2019-10-22). Shows single download progress bar *_code="". fixes output vignette closes issue #42 (2019-08-05)

title: geobr v1.0
text: CRAN release: 2019-08-05 Country States Regions Meso regions Micro regions Municipalities Census weighting areas Census tracts Statistical Grid
